sentences.english: Tree plantation requires a lot of water and the land used for tree plantations are generally suitable for growing crops.
sentences.chinese: 種樹需要很多水，種樹用地通常也適合糧作。

sentences.english: Tree plantation requires a lot of water and the land used for tree plantations are generally suitable for growing crops.
sentences.chinese: 種樹需要很多水，種樹用地通常也適合糧作。

sentences.english: I can plant trees and flowers in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 本人能在花園裏種樹栽花。

sentences.english: You plant trees, I Zhihua, Kuaiba Beijing to Green.
sentences.chinese: 你種樹，我栽花，快把北京來綠化。

sentences.english: So trees have to be planted in massive concrete tubs of soil sunk into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 所以，要種樹就得先往地裏置入巨型土盆。

sentences.english: If the tree lives, who really knows the efforts put in by the planter?
sentences.chinese: 若是種得好，有誰知道種樹人的辛苦？

sentences.english: Can I read the boks about trees?
The reason why we have to grow trees is that they can provide us with fresh air. The reason why we have to grow trees is that they can supply fresh air for us。
sentences.chinese: 我們必須種樹的原因是它們能供應我們新鮮的空氣。

sentences.english: When Dr. Gibbs wasnt saving lives, he was planting trees.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯醫生不拯救人性命的時候就去種樹。

sentences.english: I'm planting a tree. Is it straight?
The road of love will blossom trees, so the lovers become husband and wife.
sentences.chinese: 愛情之路總要開花種樹，因此戀人成爲夫妻。

sentences.english: We dig some pits with a spade before planting the trees.
sentences.chinese: 種樹前，我們先用鐵鍬挖了些坑。

sentences.english: The reason why we have to grow trees is that they can provideus with fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須種樹的原因是它們能供應我們新鮮的空氣。

sentences.english: It has become fashionable for young couples to plant trees to celebrate their weddings.
sentences.chinese: 新婚夫婦種樹留念成爲時尚。

sentences.english: April is the time to plant trees.

definition: to cool off in the shade
